facet_1.name: Sepulchre
facet_1.effects: Grave Chill is now an area-targeted ability and applies all ability effects to enemy units within the radius. Secondary targets within the radius grant a lesser portion of speed bonus to Visage and its Familiars. Ã—0.3 Secondary Targets Ability Value Factor

facet_2.name: Faithful Followers
facet_2.effects: Issues an attack command to all current Familiars upon Grave Chill cast. The Familiars attempt to attack the unit-targeted enemy within its attack range. Familiars will automatically attack Visage's last-attacked target. It returns if that enemy unit is out of Visage's attack range, or when Visage issues a cancel current action or hold position command. +200 Familiar Attack Search Range, +170 Familiar Attack Range, +20 Familiar Move Speed, x0.5 Familiar Gold Bounty

facet_3.name: Death Toll
facet_3.effects: Soul Assumption now applies a debuff that grants Visage additional unreliable gold per charge upon the debuff-affected unit's death.

effects: Grants the Silent as the Grave ability
Grants Visage and its Familiars bonus movement speed and invisiblilty for the duration
Upon losing the invisibility buff in any way, the ability now grants Visage and its Familiars bonus attack damage
The aura affects and applies its values corresponding to Visage's on all Summoned Familiars within the radius
However, the min damage threshold proc does not apply to them
Grants Visage the properties of Stone Form after an effect delay, granting invulnerability and bonus health regeneration

level_20: +1 Armor Corruption to Visage and Familiars
level_10: +6 Attack Damage to Visage and Familiars

abilities.name: Lurker
abilities.description: Grants cooldown acceleration stacks when Visage is not taking damage.
abilities.details: The buff stack recovers itself over a fixed duration. Neither can be reset with cooldown reset sources, nor be affected by percentage-based cooldown reductions.

abilities.name: Stone Form
abilities.description: The nearest Familiar turns into stone and smashes into the ground after a short delay, granting invulnerability and bonus health regeneration. Stone Form deals damage and stuns all enemy units within the radius centered around the Familiar.
abilities.details: This sub-ability goes on a downtime equal to the lowest cooldown among all current Familiars. It is neither affected by cooldown reset sources nor affected by percentage-based cooldown reductions.

abilities.name: Hero Model
abilities.description: Visage's hero model has the following hidden innate abilities. It may only perform or utilize the ability's functions upon a successful channeling.
abilities.details: Visage is considered a ground unit, despite its hero model showing otherwise. Most hero models ascend the z-axis upon Silent as the Grave cast.

ability_1.name: Grave Chill
ability_1.details: Drains both the movement speed and attack speed of the unit-targeted enemy.
ability_1.description: Drains both the movement speed and attack speed of the unit-targeted enemy. Grants Visage a movement speed and attack speed buff independently from the debuff applied to the affected enemy unit. All ability bonuses are applied as a buff to each Familiars independently within the radius.

facet_effects.sepulchre: Grave Chill is now an area-targeted ability and applies all ability effects to enemy units within the radius. Effect Radius: 300, Move Speed Bonus per Enemy: 3.6%/4.8%/6%/7.2%, Attack Speed Bonus per Enemy: 7.5/12/16.5/21
facet_effects.faithful_followers: Issues an attack command to all current Familiars upon Grave Chill cast. Attack Search Range: 550

technical_details: All ability effects are applied immediately despite the visual effects, and cannot be disjointed
interaction_notes: Nullifies the ability with Spell Block
Sepulchre does not proc Spell Block sources on secondary affected targets

ability_2.name: Soul Assumption
ability_2.details: Focuses all gathered Soul Assumption charges to a single spell projectile, and deals damage corresponding to the gathered charges.
ability_2.description: Gathers Soul Assumption charges each time nearby heroes take a certain amount of damage. The damage counter only grants charges from the damage instances of the following ranges.

facet_effects.death_toll: Soul Assumption applies a debuff on the affected enemy unit that grants gold bonus corresponding to the current charges upon the unit's death. Gold Bonus per Charge: 30, Debuff Duration: 3, Creep Gold Bonus Factor: 0.15

interaction_notes: Nullifies the ability with Spell Block
Proc Spell Block sources on secondary affected targets independently

ability_3.name: Gravekeeper's Cloak
ability_3.details: Generates a stone-layered buff that manipulates incoming damage. Removes a stack per player-based damage taken above a certain damage threshold.
ability_3.description: The aura affects and applies its values corresponding to Visage's on all Summoned Familiars within the radius. However, the min damage threshold proc does not apply to them.
interaction_notes: Disables the buff stack gain with Break Sources
However, existing stacks are not removed

ability_4.name: Silent as the Grave
ability_4.details: Grants Visage and its Familiars bonus movement speed and invisiblilty for the duration.
ability_4.description: Upon losing the invisibility buff in any way, the ability now grants Visage and its Familiars bonus attack damage. Only affects Visage and his Familiars.
interaction_notes: Acquiring Aghanim's Scepter unlocks this ability
Does not interrupt Visage's channeling abilities upon cast

ability_5.name: Summon Familiars
ability_5.details: Conjures blind and controllable Familiars to fight for Visage. Familiars have flying movement and can turn into Stone Form.
ability_5.description: All current Familiars halt their movement and teleport over to Visage's side after an effect delay with Alt-Cast toggled on. Familiars cannot act while preparing for the teleportation.

facet_effects.faithful_followers: Familiars will automatically attack Visage's last-attacked target. They will return if that enemy unit is out of Visage's attack range, or when Visage issues a cancel current action or hold position command. Set Move Speed: 440, Set Attack Range: 350, Set Gold Bounty: 50

interaction_notes: Interrupts Visage's channeling abilities upon cast
Instant kill all current Familiars from a previous cast upon cast
